meanings.definition: The edible nut of any tree of the genus Juglans, especially the Persian walnut.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on walnuts during my study breaks.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a cup of chopped walnuts.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored so many walnuts in its tiny house, it couldn't fit inside!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of ideas, each one a walnut waiting to be cracked open.
meanings.sent5: The sound of walnuts cracking underfoot filled the autumn air with a satisfying crunch.

meanings.sent1: The walnut in our backyard provides shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted a row of walnut trees along the field.
meanings.sent3: The walnut tree waved its branches in the wind as if greeting passersby.
meanings.sent4: The walnut tree stood tall and proud, its roots reaching deep into the earth.
meanings.sent5: Under the walnut tree, children played and laughed, their voices echoing through the leaves.
